Earnings Call Summary

The latest earnings calls of Samsung highlighted a strong performance in the fourth quarter of 2025, driven primarily by a booming memory business. The Device Solutions division saw revenue jump 33% quarter on quarter to KRW44 trillion, with operating proX

Recent calls highlight a period of "chip inflation" and strategic shifts in the semiconductor supply chain. Rising costs in mature processes and packaging have triggered price hikes of up to 50% for components like MCUs in China, while a persistent AI-driven memory shortage is expected to last through 2026
